title: All my champion pts are down at zero
body: I can't see any of my champion levels and I've restarted the game multiple times. Does anyone know the solution?

replies.body: A bit late, but all players were experiencing this issue a few days ago! You can find updates on the [Server Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) when issues arise like this and we'll keep you update there as well. :) As you know the issue also has been resolved, so you should see your Masteries again.
It seems to be a bug and they are already working on a fix^^
